title: 58 Virtual Freedom and the International Outsourcing Rock Star, Chris Ducker
description: Chris Ducker is the go to guy for anyone seeking to grow their business with the power of outsourcing. In this episode of the School of Greatness podcast Chris and Lewis discuss the power of building a team and how it can allow you more freedom and abundance in your life.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
content:encoded: Chris Ducker is the go to guy for anyone seeking to grow their business with the power of outsourcing. In this episode of the School of Greatness podcast Chris and Lewis discuss the power of building a team and how it can allow you more freedom and abundance in your life.
